12.25.18  10:49 pm   Any chance you'd ever add some songs like you're free to do whatever you want to, rabbit snakes, several new song:s, etc. to the streaming sites/purchase sites? I want to pay you for them, knowing that they are given freely (and have them conveniently in one place for lazy people like me)

these

     How does your handwriting as animated in some videos compare to your usual handwriting--stylized in any major way, as far as you're concerned? It's super neat.

12.25.18  8:55 pm   this is less of a question but more of a comment but every time you release a new song the first time I listen it's okayish and not that catchy but then when I put it on repeat it just becomes so G O O D and I can't stop listening and certain parts just speak to me. your music never disappoints, please don't stop

12.25.18  8:09 pm   Hey Bill, recently I've been thinking a lot about how augmented chords and how sad it is that they're almost never used. Do you know why that is?

      What are some cool ways that an aug chord could be used, perhaps an example from some music you like or have written?
12.25.18  8:04 pm   are u overwhelmed by all the people who interact with u on the internet
12.25.18  8:02 pm   If you were the first person to come into communication with an intelligent alien species curious about humans, what would you tell them about humans?
12.25.18  7:57 pm   Is there any connection between Jordan Peterson's lectures and "Just did a bad thing"?
12.25.18  7:55 pm   Congrats on 3 million subs Bill! Are you planning to fill your house with 3 million balloons?
12.25.18  7:22 pm   will you give us grooved plastic discs of your creations?

12.25.18  7:06 pm   Hey Bill! I forgot the question I asked a couple of days ago. Did you remember? 

this
12.25.18  6:59 pm   hi im sad. how not to be sad. because im very sad all the time and it makes me sad

12.25.18  6:57 pm   Alright, maybe I'm just stupid, or maybe I'm anxious and depressed and hypervigilant, but your recent song set off a few red flags, per se.  This is less of a question and more just a kinda I dunno, really.  Asking "are you OK" and expecting a genuine like "oh yeah that's a cry for help i'm suicidal" is... not gonna work, and that's patronizing as you're probably in your late twenties to early thirties; you're a big boy who can answer big boy questions and do big boy things by himself.  But I guess just... if you're struggling, please look into seeing a therapist or a psychiatrist.  I love your content and I think you're a pretty damn swell guy.  I would hate to think that you're not doing well and maybe did "a bad thing" if that "bad thing" is what I think it is.

12.25.18  6:43 pm   what are some tips for analyzing jazz harmony for the sake of consistency? I have a hard time with V7/IV for example, i dont know if i should just start writing them I7  but sacrifice the "ii-V-I" in the analysis by not using IV as reference. I think there may be different ways to write them down depending on if i want to learn whats going on, or if i want to be able to read it quickly in any key.

12.25.18  6:28 pm   I've done a bad thing before too, but i think it'll be okay. Merry Christmas, bill! Doing anything special today?

      And if you don't celebrate then i hope you have a nice Tuesday

sure
